name: Yutu Aliens Free
description:
• Yutu Aliens •

Yutu Aliens is a quick and fun game that requires particular attention and will challenge your reflexes the hard way. Your ultimate impossible goal is to crush all aliens to the end of each level to stop the invasion. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- Tap Aliens of the same color for more points.
- Watch for special characters, they might explode for more fun :)
- Master 45 impossible levels spread over 3 awesome worlds.
- Easy to learn, hard to master addictive gameplay.

Stop as many aliens as you can. Fun and easy to play!

- Simple Controls
- Impossible Challenges
- Addicting Gameplay
- Unlock all impossible levels
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
